mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST (WISHLIST_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_ID, GOODS_NUMBER,SHOP_NAME, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_IMAGE) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.WISHLIST_NUMBER), 0) + 1 FROM WISHLIST A), #{customerId}, #{goodsNumber}, #{shopName}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsImage})
mapper.select: SELECT W.WISHLIST_NUMBER, W.CUSTOMER_ID, W.GOODS_NUMBER, W.SHOP_NAME, W.GOODS_NAME, W.GOODS_IMAGE, G.GOODS_NAME, G.PRICE FROM WISHLIST W JOIN GOODS G ON W.GOODS_NUMBER = G.GOODS_NUMBER WHERE W.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} ORDER BY W.WISHLIST_NUMBER DESC
